original_title: Nina Hartley's Guide to the Perfect Orgy
overview: Adult film legend Nina Hartley and eleven of her closest friends get together to teach you how to create the perfect orgy! Watch as Nina explains party pros and cons, and demonstrates the delicious decadence that results when everyone plays nice! She also goes over the up-front ground rules and offers examples for holding a successful orgy of your own. Let Nina teach you how to be the host of hostess with the mostest!
tagline: The First Guide For Couples And Singles Advising How To Host The Perfect Orgy Party!
title: Nina Hartley's Guide to the Perfect Orgy
